meanings.definition: A very large number or quantity
meanings.sent1: There were billons of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in billons of grains of sand.
meanings.sent3: The toddler thought there were billons of monsters under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with billons of leaves rustling in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The library contained billons of books waiting to be read.

meanings.sent1: The billionaire had billons of dollars in his bank account.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a billons from her wealthy relative.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full, it felt like it held billons of coins.
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest was rumored to contain billons of gold coins.
meanings.sent5: The company's revenue reached billons this quarter.

meanings.definition: A list of items for payment or consideration
meanings.sent1: The billons included the cost of groceries, utilities, and rent.
meanings.sent2: He carefully reviewed the billons before making the payment.
meanings.sent3: The billons on the receipt seemed longer than usual.
meanings.sent4: She organized the billons into categories for easier tracking.
meanings.sent5: The billons for the project were submitted for approval.
